languages.text: "Я... понимаю. Будет нелегко, но нам лучше забыть о случившемся". {n}Кассия невольно касается припухших губ, и неловкое молчание повисает в воздухе, пока Леди-Навигатор не замечает {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}треснувший камень{/d}, разодравший тонкую кожу на шее.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Я... понимаю. Будет нелегко, но нам лучше забыть о случившемся". {n}Кассия невольно касается припухших губ, и неловкое молчание повисает в воздухе, пока Леди-Навигатор не замечает треснувший камень, разодравший тонкую кожу на шее.{/n}

languages.text: "I... understand. It will be difficult but it is for the best that we forget about what happened." {n}Cassia involuntarily touches her lips and an awkward silence hangs in the air until she notices the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}cracked stone{/d} that has torn the delicate skin on her neck.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Я... понимаю. languages.text: 「私、その、分かりました。難しいかもしれませんが、このことは忘れるのが一番ですね」{n}カシアは思わず唇に触れ、まずい沈黙が空気中に漂う。そして彼女は首の繊細な皮膚を引き裂いている、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}ひび割れた石{/d}に気づく。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I... understand. It will be difficult but it is for the best that we forget about what happened." {n}Cassia involuntarily touches her lips and an awkward silence hangs in the air until she notices the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}cracked stone{/d} that has torn the delicate skin on her neck.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「私、その、分かりました。難しいかもしれませんが、このことは忘れるのが一番ですね」{n}カシアは思わず唇に触れ、まずい沈黙が空気中に漂う。そして彼女は首の繊細な皮膚を引き裂いている、{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}ひび割れた石{/d}に気づく。{/n}

languages.text: “我……我能理解。尽管这有点困难，但我们最好还是忘记刚刚发生的事情。”{n}卡西娅不由自主地摸了摸嘴唇，空气中笼罩着尴尬的沉默。随后，她意识到胸口的石头已经{d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}裂开了{/d}，撕开了她脖子上娇嫩的皮肤。{/n}
languages.original_text: "I... understand. It will be difficult but it is for the best that we forget about what happened." {n}Cassia involuntarily touches her lips and an awkward silence hangs in the air until she notices the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}cracked stone{/d} that has torn the delicate skin on her neck.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “我，呃，我能理解。尽管这有点困难，但我们最好还是忘记刚刚发生的事情。”{n}卡西娅不由自主地摸了摸嘴唇，空气中笼罩着尴尬的沉默。随后，她意识到胸口的石头已经裂开了，撕开了她脖子上娇嫩的皮肤。{/n}

languages.text: «Lo... lo entiendo. Será difícil, pero lo mejor es que olvidemos lo ocurrido». {n}Cassia se toca inconscientemente los labios y un incómodo silencio permanece en el aire hasta que repara en la {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}piedra agrietada{/d} que ha desgarrado la delicada piel de su cuello.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I... understand. It will be difficult but it is for the best that we forget about what happened." {n}Cassia involuntarily touches her lips and an awkward silence hangs in the air until she notices the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}cracked stone{/d} that has torn the delicate skin on her neck.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Lo... lo entiendo. Será difícil, pero lo mejor es que olvidemos lo ocurrido». {n}Cassia se toca inconscientemente los labios y un incómodo silencio permanece en el aire hasta que repara en la piedra agrietada que ha desgarrado la delicada piel de su cuello.{/n}

languages.text: "Ich ... verstehe. Es wird nicht leicht werden, doch es ist das Beste, wenn wir einfach vergessen, was geschehen ist." {n}Cassia berührt unbewusst ihre Lippen. Ein betretenes Schweigen hängt in der Luft, bis sie den {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}zerbrochenen Stein{/d} bemerkt, der die zarte Haut an ihrem Hals verletzt hat.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I... understand. It will be difficult but it is for the best that we forget about what happened." {n}Cassia involuntarily touches her lips and an awkward silence hangs in the air until she notices the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}cracked stone{/d} that has torn the delicate skin on her neck.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Ich, äh, ich verstehe. Es wird nicht leicht werden, doch es ist das Beste, wenn wir einfach vergessen, was geschehen ist." {n}Cassia berührt unbewusst ihre Lippen. Ein betretenes Schweigen hängt in der Luft, bis sie den zerbrochenen Stein bemerkt, der die zarte Haut an ihrem Hals aufgerissen hat.{/n}

languages.text: « Je... comprends. Ce ne sera pas facile, mais nous ferions mieux d'oublier ce qui s'est passé, » {n}affirme Cassia en se caressant inconsciemment les lèvres. Un silence gênant s'installe, jusqu'à ce qu'elle remarque que la {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}pierre fendue{/d} a percé la peau délicate de son cou.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I... understand. It will be difficult but it is for the best that we forget about what happened." {n}Cassia involuntarily touches her lips and an awkward silence hangs in the air until she notices the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}cracked stone{/d} that has torn the delicate skin on her neck.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Je... je comprends. Ce ne sera pas facile, mais nous ferions mieux d'oublier ce qu'il s'est passé, » {n}affirme Cassia en se caressant inconsciemment les lèvres. Un silence gênant s'installe, jusqu'à ce qu'elle remarque que la pierre fendue a percé la peau délicate de son cou.{/n}

languages.text: "Anlıyorum... Zor olsa da en iyisi, olanları unutalım." {n}Cassia, istemsizce dudaklarına dokunurken ortama gergin bir sessizlik çöküyor. Derken {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}çatlamış taşın{/d}, narin boynunu yırttığını fark ediyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "I... understand. It will be difficult but it is for the best that we forget about what happened." {n}Cassia involuntarily touches her lips and an awkward silence hangs in the air until she notices the {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}cracked stone{/d} that has torn the delicate skin on her neck.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Anlıyorum... Zor olsa da, en iyisi olanları unutalım." {n}Cassia istemsizce dudaklarına dokunurken ortama gergin bir sessizlik çöküyor. Derken, Cassia {d|Encyclopedia:Ch1_CassiaAmuletOn}çatlamış taşın{/d} boynunun narin cildini yırttığını fark ediyor.{/n}
